explanations: I chose this theta because the number of sheep has increased, providing a better opportunity for hunting without overexerting myself. With the recent decrease in the wolf population, a moderate intensity will help me secure food while minimizing competition with other wolves.

I chose this theta because the sheep population has increased, providing a better opportunity for hunting. However, with the decrease in the wolf population, I need to balance my hunting intensity to ensure I can still compete with other wolves while not overexerting myself. A theta of 0.70 allows me to hunt effectively without risking exhaustion.
vocalizations: Growwllllllll... times are tough, but I will adapt!
